metadata.title: CVE-2019-9628 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
The XMLTooling library all versions prior to V3.0.4, provided with theOpenSAML and Shibboleth Service Provider software, contains an XML parsingclass. Invalid data in the XML declaration causes an exception of a typethat was not handled properly in the parser class and propagates anunexpected exception type.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-9628` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libxmltooling7 - 1.6.4-1ubuntu2.1
xmltooling-schemas - 1.6.4-1ubuntu2.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: xmltooling package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.6.4-1ubuntu2.1').
